property.proptype: Write in the present tense except for historical or future references
Describe one type of reference information per topic
property.propdesc: To increase reusability, references should contain one "scope" of reference information. Instead of adding more than one reference table (and other pieces of reference content describing different information), split it into two different references.

property.proptype: Use consistent title content for references
property.propdesc:
References should have titles describing (noun-based) what information the topic describes. Examples might be:
REST API Endpoints
Important Vert.x methods

property.proptype: Write shortdesc short descriptions for references
property.propdesc:
Describe further details about the reference or povide context for when the informtion of the topic is relevant.
For consistency, all reference topics require a short description.
